body.name: NeuType 44" x 16" Over The Door Mirror Full Length Mirror Door Mirror Hanging with 2 Metal Hangers for Bedroom Living Room Bathroom Black

features: 【DOOR MIRROR OVERALL SIZE】The 44"x16" mirror is light and easy to move here and there. Perfect for small space and creates the illusion of a wider space.

【SAVING SPACE】 Over the door mirror is designed with simplicity and precision, offering a full-length body view reflection. This kind of mirror best for entryways, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and hallways... Saving your space by placing the mirror over the door.
【ENVIRONMENTAL-PROTECTION FRAME】The frame is made of high-quality polymer material, high density, hard and durable. Meanwhile, the mirror uses shatter-proof glass, more safe, more reassuring.

【EASY SETUP, WIDE APPLICATION】The full length mirror can lean against the wall or can be hung over the door with with 2 adjustable hangers, or you can mount it on the wall vertically/horizontally for space-saving with the included screws kit. It is easy to set up by yourself.

【SATISFACTION CUSTOMER SERVICE】We offer full refund/free replacement for mirrors damaged on arrival, no need to return, you just need to send us some pictures through Amazon Message to show: the damaged mirror, the outer box and the shipping label. We'll try our best to reply each of your messages as soon as possible in less than 24 hours.
body.description: NeuType Over The Door Full Length Mirror Quality Material: L-44" X W-16"、L-47" X W-16"、L-51" X W-16"、L-55" X W-16"，High-quality polymer materialShatterproof: Scatter prevention and shatterproof membrane, shattered glass will not be spilled out even impacted by external force, safer and more protective.Multi-layered & HD: Original edge-sealing technology, lasting and more durable. The mirror is of high-definition(HD) and 1:1 real reflection with no distortion. Integrated Hook: The hooks of this NeuType mirror are directly installed on the back integrating with the mirror, you can hang the mirror on the wall with ease. Adopts anti-oxidation treatment and anti-rot materials, no deformation, no crack. 5mm high-definition silver mirror, creates more lively imaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror/Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 mirrors. One came in perfect condition, the second was broken, most likely from shipping. I made an exchange right away through Amazon and before I even returned the broken one, I received a new perfect mirror as it's replacement! The customer service was excellent! (And then I returned the broken one, of course.)Just fyi- I didn't notice the hangers are located on the outside of the styrofoam within the packaging. I ordered white, so they blended in with the styrofoam. So be on the lookout for them if you plan to hang over a door.But as for the quality- They're excellent! I can see my full body when I use them on my door. They're sturdy, and have clean lines so they blend in with a variety of decor.Thank you NeuType!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy and the perfect size
reviews.reviewText: I have mine hanging over my closet door and it fits perfectly. My door has a pattern, and the hooks are pretty wide. I solved it by glueing the mirror to the door but works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I just received the mirror. Looks very nice, easy to install brackets and hang. Problem is one of the thin metal brackets appears to be damaged and has break in it; also, the brackets are not exactly the same size and have way different bends. Can I please have a set of replacement brackets sent ASAP.Thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is a good size for my bedroom door. It's easy to set up. Packed very well when it came. The only thing I don't like is when you open and close the door it swings and makes loud noises. I think it would be nice if the door came with something to stick on the mirror or door to minimize the noise and swinging of the mirror on the door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars In what world, does it make sense to put hanging hooks, on one side of the side of the corners...
reviews.reviewText: If I could give this product zero stars, believe me, I would.So much wrong with this product.For starters, the instructions are not instructions for this mirror.I don't know who thought these instructions would pass off as universal mirror instructions...but they are not universal.This mirror does not have hanging slots built in, like visually depicted in the instructions.And whoever decided the hanging hooks should go one 1 corner of the sides of the mirror and not the middle, WOW. You genius, you...Im sure the person who came up with the hook placement is a very creative individual...but it does not make sense to place 1 hanging hook on the corner of the mirror sides, because once it's "hung" it will be crooked.If it ain't broke, don't fix it or add your *sparkle* to it.Just keep the hanging hooks in the middle.I'll figure out a way to properly hang these hopefully, or order a new mirror with proper hanging hooks and instructions.Save your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shouldn't be advertised as over the door mirror
reviews.reviewText: It's a wall mirror with 2 hooks thrown in as an afterthought. No instructions for door hanging and you need to remove the wall hooks so it sits flush against door. Aggravated right now. It's done now and with the use of extra double sided adhesive, it's secure. Yay. Update: so besides the hanging debacle, the actual mirror itself looks very nice hanging on my closet door. So not a complete disappointment in the end :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than i thought
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is so great it doesn't take a rocket scientist to install, it's sturdy, and super easy to clean. <3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this was a great deal! I had to get a hanging mirror because i live in an apartment and it hangs over the door. It took a few times to get one shipped that was not damaged, but it was worth the wait.
Esta padre que se cuelgue a la pared, pero los tornillos que traían no corresponden al ancho del marco y lo puedes perforar
